My hosting company uses a shared SQL Server and I need to change the Club.mdf database to a different name. I tried renaming it to RSCS.mdf and making changes to the ConnectionString, but when I run the program, the following error is thrown by HitCounter.ascx. Can someone explain to this .NET rookie how to properly change the database name without breaking the program?

Thanks,
Ed
